mapper.update: update t_score_seq set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, open_id, type, score, remark, create_date from t_score_seq where open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_date desc
select id, open_id, type, score, remark, create_date from t_score_seq
